organizations.title: How can we help you?
organizations.description: Get answers in seconds with our AI search or find them in our detailed articles.
organizations.searchPlaceholder: Ask AI or search for articles

structure.name: Getting Started
structure.description: Best steps on getting started with Featurebase.

structure.title: Add your branding
structure.description: Make Featurebase feel like home by changing the colors, logo, and default theme of your public portal.

structure.title: Invite your team
structure.description: Invite your team to help you manage feedback, changelog, and the help center.

structure.title: Collect & manage feedback
structure.description: This is your one-stop guide to getting started with collecting and organizing feedback with Featurebase.

structure.title: Share product updates
structure.description: This is your one-stop guide to getting started with sharing product updates with Featurebase.

structure.title: Set up the Help Center
structure.description: This is your one-stop guide to publishing a Help Center with Featurebase.

structure.title: Run surveys
structure.description: This is your one-stop guide to getting started with surveys in Featurebase.

structure.title: Public vs private forum
structure.description: Learn the difference between a public and a private organization in Featurebase and which one is right for you.

structure.title: Using Featurebase with multiple products
structure.description: Learn the best setup for using Featurebase with multiple different products.

structure.title: Integrate with other tools
structure.description: Overview of all integrations in Featurebase and what you can do with them.

structure.name: Feedback
structure.description: Learn how to edit your Feedback Portal and collect feedback from your users.

structure.title: What's a Feedback Portal?
structure.description: Feedback Portal is where your users submit feedback, upvote others’ posts, and comment on them.

structure.title: Sharing your Feedback Portal
structure.description: Share your Feedback Portal with your users to get feedback, show your product updates, and more.

structure.title: Editing the Feedback Portal's text
structure.description: Learn to customize the texts and buttons on your Feedback Portal.

structure.title: Changing the default post-sorting order
structure.description: Change the default order in which posts on your feedback portal are shown:

structure.title: Feedback Portal in multiple languages
structure.description: Have your Public Portal and feedback in your customers' native languages, automatically visible to the language speakers.

structure.title: Disabling the Feedback Portal
structure.description: Here's how to completely disable the Feedback Portal view from being shown to your users.

structure.title: Board privacy controls
structure.description: Learn to limit the access of feedback boards to team members, select user groups, etc.

structure.title: Internal team boards
structure.description: Manage internal feedback with private boards that only your Featurebase team members can access.

structure.title: Segmented access boards
structure.description: Limit certain boards to only specific user groups that you have defined.

structure.title: Author-only boards & posts
structure.description: Default all posts on a board to be seen only by the author & your internal team.

structure.title: Company-only boards & posts
structure.description: Default all posts on a board to be seen only by the author's company members & your internal team.

structure.title: Read-only boards
structure.description: Disable posting on a board for users, so that only admins can create posts on that board.

structure.title: Anonymous (no log-in) posting, upvoting, and commenting
structure.description: Allow your users to post, upvote, and comment without signing up first.

structure.title: Hiding users' names, pictures, and the leaderboard
structure.description: To prevent users from seeing information about each other, completely hide the leaderboard and users' information from your public portal.

structure.title: What are in-app widgets?
structure.description: Overview of all embeddable widgets in Featurebase and what you can do with them.

structure.title: Feedback Widget
structure.description: Embed a simple feedback widget in your app to start gathering feedback.

structure.title: All-In-One Widget
structure.description: An embeddable widget that brings the feedback portal, roadmap, changelog, and help center inside your web page or app.

structure.title: Embedded Feedback Portal
structure.description: Embed the Feedback Portal directly into your web page or app to allow users to submit feedback, vote on features, and view the changelog.

structure.title: Set up feedback boards
structure.description: Set up your feedback boards to start categorizing different types of feedback.

structure.title: Edit & delete feedback boards
structure.description: Learn how to customize, edit, and delete your feedback boards.

structure.title: Custom fields for the post form
structure.description: Create custom fields for the feedback form to collect additional information about users' issues.

structure.title: AI board suggestions
structure.description: Our AI automatically suggests the right board for new posts using the context of the post title.

structure.title: Merging duplicate posts
structure.description: Merge duplicate posts into a single post to reduce clutter and sum up votes.

structure.title: AI grouping posts on similar topics
structure.description: Group together similar posts to better understand what users are looking for in certain areas and easily merge duplicate posts.

structure.title: AI feedback summarization
structure.description: Ask AI to answer any of your questions based on your feedback and have it summarize search results for you.

structure.title: Post & comment moderation
structure.description: Enable post moderation to review all new posts and/or comments before they are made public.

structure.title: How to filter & sort feedback
structure.description: Learn how to use filters, and sort through feedback to find exactly what you need!

structure.title: Saving filters as views
structure.description: Create Views of your most used filter combinations for convenient repeated use.

structure.title: Prioritizing feedback by customer revenue
structure.description: Prioritize feedback by upvoters' revenue to make more impactful product decisions.

structure.title: Viewing posts by certain users/companies
structure.description: Find posts made by a specific user or all posts from a single company.

structure.title: Using prioritization frameworks
structure.description: Easily prioritize and visualize your ideas using Value/effort framework.

structure.title: Assigning posts to teammates
structure.description: Streamline your feedback process by assigning posts to teammates.

structure.title: Bulk editing posts
structure.description: Use bulk editing to quickly perform actions on multiple posts at once.

structure.title: Post statuses
structure.description: Show your users the current state of a post.

structure.title: Post tags
structure.description: Use tags to organize and sort your feedback.

structure.title: Allow users to select post tags
structure.description: Use public tags to let users set tags for their posts during submission.

structure.title: How to set ETA for posts
structure.description: Set an Estimated Time of Arrival for posts to manage expectations.

structure.title: Editing & deleting existing posts
structure.description: Here's everything you can edit about an existing post and how to delete it, if needed.

structure.title: Changing the post author
structure.description: Change the author of a post to any existing or new user.

structure.title: Hiding post statuses from the public view
structure.description: By default, users can see the statuses of posts publicly. However, you can hide all statuses from the public Feedback Portal.

structure.title: Hiding completed & canceled posts from the public Feedback Portal
structure.description: By default, completed and canceled posts are shown on the public Feedback Portal. You can hide them to keep your feedback boards clean.

structure.title: Hiding post & comment creation dates
structure.description: Hide post & comment creation dates from the public view.

structure.title: How to pin/highlight posts
structure.description: Pin a post on top of the Feedback Portal to highlight it.

structure.description: We use a reliable system to automatically detect spam on your Feedback Portal.

structure.description: Learn how to download / export your feedback into a .csv (spreadsheet file)

structure.title: Vote, comment & create posts on behalf of users
structure.description: Upvote posts on behalf of your users to sign them up for updates related to that post.

structure.title: Follow-up questions
structure.description: The automated follow-up questions give you additional insights from users that upvote a post.

structure.title: Enable downvoting
structure.description: Enable downvoting so users can add negative votes.

structure.title: Hiding vote count until upvoted
structure.description: Hide the vote count from users until they have upvoted the post to remove bias.

structure.description: Learn to add and remove upvoters of a post.

structure.description: You can view all post voters together with their info and export them if needed.

structure.description: Notify all upvoters about the status change of a post.

structure.description: Speed up your feedback replies with powerful macros and AI actions.

structure.description: Create private comments for internal communication and notes between Featurebase admins.

structure.description: Disable comment notifications to your Featurebase inbox if the comment is not directed at you.

structure.description: Get an overview of how many posts, comments, and votes happen each day/week/month,

articles.body:
How Featurebase helps you

Get familiar with Featurebase and all of the basic concepts.

Welcome to Featurebase! 👋

This guide will cover all the basics to ensure you get the most out of Featurebase.

P.S. Join our Discord community to discuss features, get support, catch the latest updates, or simply take a moment to relax over a virtual cup of coffee. ☕

What Featurebase helps you do

1. Collect feedback

Firstly, Featurebase helps you collect and organize all feedback in one place. This can be done with our Feedback Portal, in-app widgets, and surveys.

You can give your customers a voice by collecting their ideas, votes, and engaging in detailed discussions. You can also measure additional user insights like NPS, CSAT, and much more that regular feedback doesn’t show you.

2. Manage & prioritize feedback

Then, you can manage and prioritize this feedback to identify larger trends from the noise, using filters, customer revenue, and prioritization frameworks.

This way, you can find & focus on the most impactful ideas first and avoid building unnecessary features.

But it’s not only about you. Featurebase empowers your customers and makes them feel heard. They’ll always be updated about the status of their feature requests and new product updates.

3. Communicate product updates

Once you’ve implemented their ideas, Featurebase helps you communicate product updates to your users through changelogs, automated emails, and in-app widgets.

You can also have a public roadmap to provide a quick overview of the work that’s been completed and what's ahead.

All of this ensures your users are always up-to-date with the latest updates and helps increase new feature adoption.

4. Provide self-serve support

Lastly, you can create a knowledge base to offer powerful self-serve help to your users, using both a dedicated Help Center page and an in-app widget.

But our Help Center is unlike any other.

It’s seamlessly integrated with your feedback portal, roadmap, and changelog. For example, we suggest relevant articles to users during post-creation. You can also mention help articles while answering feedback, in changelog releases, and more.

Main features

Feedback Portal

See our live feedback portal

Feedback Portal is the center core of Featurebase. It’s where your users can submit feedback, upvote others’ posts, and comment on them. Everything, including the theme, colors, and text, is completely customizable.

The Feedback Portal consists of different feedback boards that you've set up. These can be 💡 Feature Requests, 🐛 Bug Reports, and 🔗 Integrations, for example.

When users submit feedback, our AI automatically assigns it to the right board. This way, everything is neatly organized in one place, ready for you to prioritize.

Depending on whether you have a

Public vs private organization
, your Feedback Portal will be public to everyone or private for only your team to see.

More on feedback:

  • Sharing your Feedback Portal

  • What are in-app widgets?

  • Sync customer data

Roadmaps

See our live public roadmap

A roadmap is an effective tool for visualizing and communicating your product's progress externally or internally. It completely mirrors the Feedback Portal but provides a better overview of the work that’s been completed and what's ahead.

If you use an issue management tool like Linear or Jira, our integrations can automatically sync your issues and their statuses with the public roadmap. This is a great way to effortlessly show & notify users about the status of their requests.

You can also embed a roadmap into your app or website using different available methods.

More on roadmaps:

  • Sharing your roadmap

  • Creating & editing roadmaps

Changelogs


See our live changelog

Changelog is a useful tool that lets you publish product updates for your users to see in one place. This keeps everyone updated, shows that you are continuously improving, and increases new feature adoption.

You can subscribe users to the changelog to send them email notifications about the latest releases. To take full advantage of changelogs, bring these updates inside your app, where your users are.

More on changelogs:

  • Creating changelogs (+ AI writing)

  • Changelog widget & popup

  • Changelog Notification Emails

Help Center

See our live help center

Provide your users with an intuitive self-service Help Center to reduce customer support efforts, duplicate feature requests, and more.

Featurebase’s Help Center is seamlessly integrated with your feedback portal, roadmap, and changelog. For example, we suggest relevant articles to users during post-creation. You can also mention help articles while answering feedback, in changelog releases, and more.

You can also bring it inside your app with embeddable widgets and much more!

More on Help Center:

  • What is a Help Center?

  • Linking & mentioning articles

  • Help Center custom domain

Surveys

Surveys are useful for measuring different aspects that regular customer feedback doesn't show you. Some of our favorite things that you can do with surveys are:

  • Measure customer satisfaction with NPS, CSAT, etc

  • Run surveys for different customer segments

  • Collect extra feedback for more context on specific features

  • Subscribe interested users to Featurebase posts

  • And much more.

For example, the Featurebase Idea Poll is perfect for prioritizing different feature ideas from your feedback board.

More on surveys:

  • What are surveys?

  • Creating surveys

  • Survey results

Users Module

The user's module lets you get an overview of everyone interacting on your feedback board.

When users come to your board and perform an action such as upvoting a post or commenting, they are automatically added to the users’ list. You can then view what posts each user has made, what they have upvoted, etc...

You can also create different user segments based on various rules and then use them to filter through feedback, create targeted changelogs, and more.

More on users:

  • Sync customer data

  • What's the user's module?

  • What are user segments?

  • User tags

Widgets

Try out all widgets here

In-app widgets are one of the best ways to collect feedback, communicate updates, and provide self-serve help inside your app to reduce friction.

  • All-In-One Widget: Feature-packed widget that supports all featurebase modules, including feedback portal, roadmap, changelog, and help center. (on the screenshot)

  • Feedback Widget: Lightweight widget focused on collecting feedback & bug reports inside your app, has a built-in screenshot engine.

  • Changelog Widget & Popup: Both widgets let you conveniently bring the latest updates to your app for a frictionless user experience.

So…

We're super happy to see you using Featurebase.

We put our heart and soul into making this the best possible feedback tool and hope you find it as useful as we do! 💙

Recommended steps to get started:

  • Collect & manage feedback

  • Share product updates

  • Run surveys

  • Set up the Help Center

  • Restricting end-users' access

  • Integrate with other tools
